page.shortlink: api client api a5 ink lines ruled settings object
page.description: Definition of the ink page ruled lines.

property.name: flow
property.description: The flow of the ruled lines. Options are "ltr", "rtl", "ttb-ltr" and "ttb-rtl". Default is "ltr".

property.name: style
property.description: The style to render the lines in. The default value of "normal" will always render rules and margin lines. A value of "minimal" will only render rules when not editing. A value of "editing" will only render lines when editing the ink.

property.name: width
property.description: The "ink units" width of the lines.

property.name: color
property.description: CSS color to use for the margin lines.

property.name: top
property.description: The "ink units" top margin of the lines.

property.name: left
property.description: The "ink units" left margin of the lines.

property.name: right
property.description: The "ink units" right margin of the lines.

property.name: bottom
property.description: The "ink units" bottom margin of the lines.

property.name: color
property.description: CSS color to use for the lines.
